Package albumcollection

Class albumcollection

  • java.lang.Object
    • albumcollection.albumcollection

  • public class albumcollection
extends java.lang.Object
    This class handles the management of the album collection. It uses a plain-text file, "database.txt", to persist the collection information. It contains an ArrayList called collection to store the database in a runtime friendly data structure. This class provides all methods for working with the album collection.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      albumcollection​()
      This constructor creates an empty ArrayList then calls the load() method to populate albums previously stored.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addAlbum​()
      This method creates a new album and stores it in collection.
      void delete​(java.lang.String key)
      This method searches through collection to find a whole, or partial, match for the provided key, then provides a list of possible matches, then deletes the chosen album.
      void display​()
      This method prints out the contents of collection to standard input.
      void exit​()
      This method writes the ArrayList collection to the file "database.txt".
      java.util.ArrayList<album> search​(java.lang.String key)
      This method searches through collection to find a whole, or partial, match for the provided key.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • albumcollection

        public albumcollection​()
        This constructor creates an empty ArrayList then calls the load() method to populate albums previously stored.

    • Method Detail

      • display

        public void display​()
        This method prints out the contents of collection to standard input.

      • addAlbum

        public void addAlbum​()
        This method creates a new album and stores it in collection. album information is taken from user input.

      • search

        public java.util.ArrayList<album> search​(java.lang.String key)
        This method searches through collection to find a whole, or partial, match for the provided key.
        Parameters:
        key - a String that is the whole or partial match.
        Returns:
        an ArrayList that contains all the whole, or partial, matches.

      • delete

        public void delete​(java.lang.String key)
        This method searches through collection to find a whole, or partial, match for the provided key, then provides a list of possible matches, then deletes the chosen album.
        Parameters:
        key - a String that is the whole, or partial, match.

      • exit

        public void exit​()
        This method writes the ArrayList collection to the file "database.txt".
